title: Sattviko Peri Peri Makhana 50 GM | With Probiotics
name: sattviko-peri-peri-makhana-50-gm-with-probiotics
description: Sattviko Peri Peri Makhana is a perfect evening and post-yoga snack. Rich in antioxidants, protein, and fiber, this roasted snack offers a healthier alternative to deep-fried peri peri chips that are loaded with carbohydrates.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana (66%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Maltodextrin, Edible Common Salt, Sugar, Black Salt, Dehydrated Vegetable Powder (Garlic, Onion), Spices & Condiments (Dry Mango, Coriander, Red Chilli, Carom Seeds, Cumin), Flavour Enhancer (INS 621), Lemon Juice Powder, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans) 500 million CFU per serving, Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances.

title: Sattviko Pink Salt Makhana 50 GM
name: sattviko-pink-salt-makhana-50-gm
description: Pink salt contains 84 trace minerals including potassium, magnesium, and calcium, superior to regular iodized salt. Its combination with high-quality, fiber, and protein-rich makhana makes Sattviko's Pink Salt Makhana a perfect snack for summer. Additionally, this is a 100% sattvic snack that can be consumed after a yoga session.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana (63%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran Oil), Maltodextrin, Pink Salt, Black Pepper, Maize Starch, Less than 1% of - Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Natural Flavouring Substances. YOGIC HERBS: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger Clove, Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay leaf, Cumin, Beetroot, Licorice

title: Sattviko Mint Makhana Flavor 50 GM | With Anti Oxidants
name: sattviko-mint-makhana-flavor-50-gm-with-anti-oxidants
description: Mint leaves are known to boost digestive health, provide respiratory relief, and show antimicrobial effects. Sattviko Mint Makhana has the goodness of mint along with the protein, fiber, minerals, vitamins, and antioxidants coming from makhana. This 100% sattvic mint snack is ideal for yogis who love the Indian taste palette.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana (66%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Edible Common Salt, Maltodextrin, Spices & Condiments (Coriander, Dry Mango, Turmeric Powder, Ginger, Clove, Cinnamon, Mace, Cardamom), Mint Powder, Green Chilli Powder, Flavour Enhancer (INS 621), Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances. Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Sattviko Millet Namkeen Sweet Chilli 20 GM
name: sattviko-millet-namkeen-sweet-chilli
description: Crunchy, spicy, and a little sweet – our Millet Namkeen Sweet Chilli is your perfect snack-time partner with a healthy twist. Made from nutrient-rich millets and infused with bold sweet chilli flavor, it also offers gut-friendly support with 500 million CFU of probiotics in every serving. A delicious functional snack that combines taste with digestive wellness, it's time to snack smart and spice it right!
ingredientsDesc: Bajra Puffs (40%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran Oil), Peanuts (19%), Bengal Gram, Sugar, Salt, Dehydrated Vegetable Powder (Garlic, Onion), Dry Mango Powder, Chilli, Ginger, Lime Powder, Lemon Powder, Turmeric, Curry Leaves, Black Salt, Probiotics (Bacillus coagulans) - 500 million CFU per pack. Less than 0.1% of - Acidity Regulator (INS 260, INS 330), Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein (Soy), Maltodextrin, Natural Sweetener (Stevia), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Natural and Nature Identical Flavouring Substances

title: Sattviko Instant Millet Meal Sweet Chilli 80 GM
name: sattviko-instant-millet-meal-sweetchilli
description: Experience the perfect balance of sweet and spice with our Sweet Chilli Millet Meal Box. Crafted from plant-based ingredients, this meal is naturally gluten-free, high in protein and fiber, and minimally processed to preserve maximum nutrition. Powered by the goodness of millets and bursting with bold flavor, it's a wholesome, feel-good option for clean, satisfying eating—anytime, anywhere.
ingredientsDesc: Barnyard Millets, Peanuts, Red Lentils (Masoor Dal), Bengal Gram (Chana), Watermelon Seeds, Flax Seeds, Veggies, Seasonings, Spices (Green Chilli, Dried Onion, Fennel, Mace, Nutmeg, Edible Salt), Olive Oil. NATURAL YOGIC HERBS- Golden Turmeric, Ashwagandha, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Garlic, Ginger, Holy Basil, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beetroot, Licorice

title: Sattviko Instant Millet Meal Schezwan 80 GM
name: sattviko-instant-millet-meal-schezwan
description: Spice up your mealtime with our Schezwan Millet Meal Box – a bold fusion of taste and nutrition. Made with plant-based ingredients, this meal is naturally gluten-free, high in protein and fiber, and minimally processed to retain its wholesome goodness. Perfect for guilt-free indulgence, it delivers a satisfying kick of Schezwan flavor while nourishing your body with the power of millets. Deliciously clean, fuel for your active day!
ingredientsDesc: Barnyard Millets, Peanuts, Red Lentils (Masoor Dal), Bengal Gram (Chana), Watermelon Seeds, Flax Seeds, Veggies, Seasonings, Spices (Onion, Garlic, Black Pepper, Ginger, Red Chilli, Coriander, cumin, Fenugreek, Tomato, Paprika), Olive Oil. NATURAL YOGIC HERBS- Golden Turmeric, Ashwagandha, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Garlic, Ginger, Holy Basil, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beetroot, Licorice

title: Sattviko Raw Cashews 200 GM
name: sattviko-raw-cashews-200-gm
description: Premium quality raw cashews that are nutritionally dense and sustainable. These cashews are perfect for snacking, cooking, or adding to your favorite recipes.

title: Sattviko Festive Gift Hamper | Healthy Snacks | Pack of 4
name: sattviko-festive-gift-hamper-pack-of-4-snacks
description: Celebrate with our Healthy Snack Festive Gift Hamper, featuring Gur Chana, Peri Peri Makhana, and flavored cashews and almonds. Packed with nutritious ingredients, this premium gift set offers a delightful mix of taste and health. Perfect for festivals and special occasions, it's the ideal gift for health-conscious snack lovers. Indulge in guilt-free snacking and spread joy with every bite.
ingredientsDesc: Contains assorted products: Gur Chana, Peri Peri Makhana, Roasted Spanish Tomato Cashews, and Roasted Smoky Schezwan Almonds. See individual products for detailed ingredients.

title: Plain Raw Phool Makhanas - 200 GM | High Quality Big Size Premium Foxnuts
name: plain-raw-phool-makhana-5-sutta-200-gm-high-quality-big-size-premium-foxnuts
description: Sattviko prides itself on the direct sourcing of Makhana from farmers, guaranteeing the utmost quality. Each batch undergoes thorough cleaning and sorting to ensure consistency. We select 5 sutta, the largest size of makhana, for our products, ensuring premium quality. This product is 100% sattvic and suitable as a post-yoga snack.

title: Sattviko Gur Makhana 40 GM
name: sattviko-gur-makhana-40-gm
description: Satisfy your sweet cravings the healthy way with our Gur Makhana, made from premium lotus seeds coated in natural jaggery and enriched with added sesame seeds for a delightful crunch. This wholesome snack is gluten-free, with no artificial colours or preservatives, making it the perfect choice for clean, conscious snacking. Light, nutritious, and irresistibly tasty!
ingredientsDesc: Jaggery (44%), Makhana (34%), Sugar, Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran Oil), Sesame (3%), Edible Common Salt, Raising Agent (INS 500(ii))
